person.persName: Lindsay Coleman, Sr. (Bath County, Kentucky, sheriff and trader.)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, sheriff and trader. Bath County, Kentucky, native. Son of George Coleman and Betsy Montgomery Coleman. Married to Mary Elizabeth Conner Coleman in Bath County, Kentucky, on November 3, 1853. Father of Lindsay Coleman, Jr., Elizabeth Coleman, and George Coleman. Deputy Sheriff in Bath County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Household owned an additional four enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Trader in Bath County in 1860.
